response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and significance to both parties involved. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality, innovation, and excellence. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $9,500 for this product. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the standard market price. I am confident that this opportunity will meet your expectations and exceed your needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 9500}
